subtitle:
1
00:00:30,100 --> 00:00:32,800
lo̍h-hō͘-siaⁿ
The sound of falling rain

2
00:00:32,800 --> 00:00:36,100
ná-chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t-tiâu koa
Is just like a song

3
00:00:36,100 --> 00:00:38,500
siáng chai-iáⁿ
Who knows?

4
00:00:38,500 --> 00:00:43,500
gún oa̍t-thâu m̄-káⁿ thiaⁿ
I turn my head, afraid to listen

5
00:00:45,900 --> 00:00:48,300
ī-hiong ê góa
Me, in a foreign land

6
00:00:48,300 --> 00:00:51,200
chi̍t-ê lâng khí ùi-kôaⁿ
Feeling the cold all alone

7
00:00:51,200 --> 00:00:54,800
siok-bo̍k ê hō͘-siaⁿ
The lonely sound of the rain

8
00:00:54,800 --> 00:00:58,600
tûi gún sim-koaⁿ
Pounds against my heart

9
00:00:59,800 --> 00:01:02,100
lâng ko͘-toaⁿ
People who are lonely

10
00:01:02,100 --> 00:01:05,600
chhiūⁿ tn̄g si̍t ê chiáu-chiah
Are like birds with broken wings

11
00:01:05,600 --> 00:01:08,100
poe bōe kiâⁿ
Unable to fly or go anywhere

12
00:01:08,100 --> 00:01:11,900
kám-kóng sī gún ê miā
Could it be that this is my fate?

13
00:01:12,000 --> 00:01:14,300
kò͘-hiong ê soaⁿ
The mountains of my hometown

14
00:01:14,300 --> 00:01:17,900
éng-oán lóng khiā tī hia
Are always standing there

15
00:01:17,900 --> 00:01:20,600
gún ê sim-chiâⁿ
My true feelings

16
00:01:20,600 --> 00:01:26,100
chí-ū kóng hō͘ soaⁿ lâi thiaⁿ
I can only tell to the mountains

17
00:01:28,400 --> 00:01:32,600
lâi-kàu kò͘-hiong ê hái-hōaⁿ
Coming to the seashore of my hometown

18
00:01:32,600 --> 00:01:39,600
kéng-sek iu-goân lóng-chóng bô piàn-hòa
The scenery remains entirely unchanged

19
00:01:40,700 --> 00:01:45,100
tong-chho͘ lī-khui sī ūi siáⁿ
Why did I leave in the beginning?

20
00:01:45,100 --> 00:01:53,200
lí nā mn̄g gún gún sim-koaⁿ tiō thiàⁿ
If you ask me, my heart just aches

21
00:01:55,900 --> 00:02:01,600
lí nā beh iú-hàu sī-tōa m̄-bián tán hó-gia̍h
If you want to be filial to your elders, you don't need to wait until you are rich

22
00:02:01,600 --> 00:02:07,600
sè-kan ū a-bú sioh ê gín-á siōng hó-miā
In this world, a child cherished by their mother is the most fortunate

23
00:02:07,600 --> 00:02:14,600
m̄-thang tán sêng-kong beh lâi chiap a-bú tòa
Do not wait until you are successful to bring Mother to live with you

24
00:02:14,600 --> 00:02:22,100
a-bú--ah, í-keng bô tī hia
Mother... is already no longer there

25
00:02:50,000 --> 00:02:52,300
lâng ko͘-toaⁿ
People who are lonely

26
00:02:52,300 --> 00:02:55,900
chhiūⁿ tn̄g si̍t ê chiáu-chiah
Are like birds with broken wings

27
00:02:55,900 --> 00:02:58,300
poe bōe kiâⁿ
Unable to fly or go anywhere

28
00:02:58,300 --> 00:03:02,100
kám-kóng sī gún ê miā
Could it be that this is my fate?

29
00:03:02,200 --> 00:03:04,600
kò͘-hiong ê soaⁿ
The mountains of my hometown

30
00:03:04,600 --> 00:03:08,100
éng-oán lóng khiā tī hia
Are always standing there

31
00:03:08,100 --> 00:03:10,600
gún ê sim-chiâⁿ
My true feelings

32
00:03:10,600 --> 00:03:16,100
chí-ū kóng hō͘ soaⁿ lâi thiaⁿ
I can only tell to the mountains

33
00:03:18,400 --> 00:03:22,600
lâi-kàu kò͘-hiong ê hái-hōaⁿ
Coming to the seashore of my hometown

34
00:03:22,600 --> 00:03:30,100
kéng-sek iu-goân lóng-chóng bô piàn-hòa
The scenery remains entirely unchanged

35
00:03:30,700 --> 00:03:35,100
tong-chho͘ lī-khui sī ūi siáⁿ
Why did I leave in the beginning?

36
00:03:35,100 --> 00:03:43,100
lí nā mn̄g gún gún sim-koaⁿ tiō thiàⁿ
If you ask me, my heart just aches

37
00:03:45,900 --> 00:03:51,600
lí nā beh iú-hàu sī-tōa m̄-bián tán hó-gia̍h
If you want to be filial to your elders, you don't need to wait until you are rich

38
00:03:51,600 --> 00:03:57,100
sè-kan ū a-bú sioh ê gín-á siōng hó-miā
In this world, a child cherished by their mother is the most fortunate

39
00:03:57,100 --> 00:04:03,600
chhut-siā-hōe cháu-chông teh kah lâng piàⁿ-su-iâⁿ
Rushing out into society, competing with others to win or lose

40
00:04:03,600 --> 00:04:08,100
ūi-tio̍h siáⁿ, ka-kī m̄ chai-iáⁿ
For the sake of what? Even I don't know

41
00:04:10,400 --> 00:04:15,600
lí nā beh iú-hàu sī-tōa m̄-bián tán hó-gia̍h
If you want to be filial to your elders, you don't need to wait until you are rich

42
00:04:15,600 --> 00:04:21,600
sè-kan ū a-bú sioh ê gín-á siōng hó-miā
In this world, a child cherished by their mother is the most fortunate

43
00:04:21,600 --> 00:04:28,600
m̄-thang tán sêng-kong beh lâi chiap a-bú tòa
Do not wait until you are successful to bring Mother to live with you

44
00:04:28,600 --> 00:04:36,100
a-bú--ah, í-keng bô tī hia
Mother... is already no longer there

45
00:04:40,100 --> 00:04:48,100
khàu chhut-siaⁿ, bô-lâng sioh-miā-miā
Crying out loud, but there is no one left to cherish me
